General.Name: Shenzhen Edadoc Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shenzhen Edadoc Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, and sale of printed circuit boards (PCBs) in China and internationally. The company also offers PCB design, SI/PI/EMC test fixture RF training consultation, design fixture customization, and backplane customization services; server, communication terminal equipment, industrial control, and handheld device motherboards; signal processing boards; and device selection services, which include the bill of materials (BOM) perfection, component replacement selection, and BOM material solutions. Its products have applications in industrial control, communications, new energy, automobiles, medical equipment, security, aerospace, and other fields. Shenzhen Edadoc Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Shenzhen Railway Financial Technology Building, Shenzhen, China, 518051
